question: The Ntangki National Park is located in which state??
explanation: The Ntangki National Park is a wildlife park located in Peren district of Nagaland. Among the creatures that inhabit the park are the rare hoolock gibbon, golden langur, hornbill, palm civets, black stork, tiger, white-breasted kingfisher, monitor lizard, python and sloth bear. The name \"Ntangki\" is derived from the Zeme dialect of the Zeliangrong tribe.
